name: Fantabulous Lite
description:
Fantabulous is a word game you can play right on your iPhone or iPod touch. You need 2 or more players to play Fantabulous. A great party game!

Get your team to guess the target word, while only using certain clue words on each card. There are several alternative methods to playing this game as well. If you like Taboo, Password, or Catch Phrase, you will love playing Fantabulous!

Lite version contains 20 cards that recycle constantly. Full version includes over 1000 cards. In addition, with the full version you will receive free updates, including free additional cards.
